<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Meeting Status"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/board-meeting/status/{thread_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get current status of a board meeting.

For async meetings (Level 3+), first checks background task results.
Then falls back to checkpointer state.

Returns the meeting state including:
- Current status (processing, awaiting_decision, complete, timeout, error)
- Phase progress (agents complete vs total)
- Confidence level if available
- Processing time if complete
- Full result data if complete (for async meetings)

Sprint 5 - BM-025: Status endpoint for polling meeting progress.
SAC-024: Enhanced to support async background task results.
